name: Nidalee
title: The Bestial Huntress
description: A jungler with powerful ganking potential and hunting mechanics

p.name: Prowl
p.description: Nidalee gains movement speed when moving through brush

q.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
q.description: Nidalee throws a javelin that damages enemies. In cougar form, she pounces for melee damage.

w.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
w.description: Nidalee sets a trap that reveals enemies. In cougar form, she pounces to a location.

e.name: Pounce / Swipe
e.description: Nidalee hunts enemies. In cougar form, she swipes nearby enemies.

r.name: Aspect of the Cougar
r.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities and movement speed.

combos.name: Spear Hunt Combo
combos.description: Lanzar lanza desde lejos y perseguir con forma de gato

tips: Land your spears for maximum damage
Use cougar form for mobility and chase
Trap placement is crucial for vision control
Hunt isolated enemies for easy kills
